name: The Oak
desc: All the hallmarks of a traditional chair - a button back cushion, full wings, and elegant wooden knuckles.

name: The Tulip
desc: A sleek, streamlined styling, these chairs are the very definition of modern sophistication and elegance.

name: The Rowan
desc: A perfect balance of comfort and style, you’ll be hard pushed to find better than these rise and recline chairs.

name: The Cedar
desc: With its combination of luxury materials and visual lightness, this chair offers an  aesthetic that fits well with most interior.

name: The Maple
desc: If you’re looking for the perfect balance of comfort and style, you’ll be hard pushed to find better.
